entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:20 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:20 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
